articles.title: Another example of 'The Simpsons' predicting future - CNN
articles.description: "The Simpsons" have continued their streak of being our pop culture Nostradamus. Fox's long-running animated series — actually the longest running in history — has an episode from 1993 which appears to foreshadow 2020 with the pandemic and "murder hornets."
